Description: argNorm is a tool to normalize antibiotic resistance genes (ARGs) by mapping them to the antibiotic resistance ontology (ARO) created by the CARD database
bio.tool_description: argNorm is a tool to normalize antibiotic resistance genes (ARGs) by mapping them to the antibiotic resistance ontology (ARO) created by the CARD database.argNorm also enhances antibiotic resistance gene annotations by providing drug categorization of the drugs that antibiotic resistance genes confer resistance to.
